thread.title_full: Alipayが韓国のKakao Payに2億ドルを出資 ― 韓国のEコマース、モバイルペイメント市場に攻勢をかける | TechCrunch Japan

author: Jon Russell
title: Alipayが韓国のKakao Payに2億ドルを出資 ― 韓国のEコマース、モバイルペイメント市場に攻勢をかける | TechCrunch Japan
text: Ant Financial 概要 Alipay is an online payment services provider. Founded by the Alibaba group, it allows individuals and businesses to execute payments online in a secure manner. Alipay's users are primarily buyers and sellers engaging in e-commerce transactions. With a registered user base of approximately 43.5 million as of June 2007, Alipay is an accepted online payment method for many online retail websites and …
